name: qso
description: A MutationObserver like API for CSS selectors.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/ && echo 'module.exports = QuerySelectorObserver;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/ && echo 'export default QuerySelectorObserver;' >> esm/index.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c && cat min.js | wc -c && gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c && cat min.js | brotli | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
